GiantOreo

Quick synopsis: A couple was expecting their second child. They discovered it had a rare developmental disorder which would have prevented any chance of survival. They had to make the difficult decision to terminate the pregnancy (a friend of mine had a similar scenario which I posted a thread on a while back). When they arrived at the clinic, they were shouted at and berated by protestors. While his wife went into surgery, the husband grabbed his cellphone and recorded his confrontation with the protestors.
 
 Here's the link (with video).
 
 Confronting Life ? The Good Men Project Magazine
 
 We need more people in the world like him.
